name: Reflecting Suicide
description:
Oh no! An evil wizard has cast a spell on you, paralyzing you and throwing you into a dungeon with only a crossbow! Your goal is to shoot mirrors, and the arrows will ricochet back at you. Your goal is to shoot yourself with your magical arrows to free yourself of the curse! Good luck!

Credit to Robert for the tile-set:https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Credit to Francicoria for main character, mirror, crossbow, arrow and logo.
This was made in a week for the GDS jam. Enjoy!
